body:
## 🐛 Bug fixes

* Align HTTP keep-alive with Jetty default (#296) @basil

## 🚨 Removed

* Remove long-unused `--ajp13Port` and `--ajp13ListenAddress` options (#291) @basil
* Remove long-deprecated handler count options (#294) @basil
* Remove unused strings (#293) @basil

## 🚨 Removed

* Deprecate the `--extraLibFolder` option for removal on or after January 1, 2023 (#290) @basil
* Remove the `--toolsJar` and `--useJasper` options without replacement (#287) @basil

## 📝 Documentation updates

* Remove outdated references to `executable-war` in documentation (#288) @basil
* Remove outdated HTTP/2 documentation (#285) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [SLF4J](https://www.slf4j.org/) from 2.0.1 to 2.0.3 (#289, #286) @dependabot

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* [JENKINS-69638](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-69638): Support HTTP/2 without custom `--extraLibFolder` configuration (#282) @basil

## 👻 Maintenance

* Exclude [SpotBugs](https://spotbugs.github.io) annotations from shaded JAR (#280) @basil

## 🚦 Tests

* Migrate from [`HttpsURLConnection`](https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/11/docs/api/java.base/javax/net/ssl/HttpsURLConnection.html) to native Java Platform HTTP client in `HttpsConnectorFactoryTest` (#281) @basil
* Migrate from [HttpUnit](http://httpunit.sourceforge.net) to native Java Platform HTTP client in tests (#277) @basil
* Migrate from [Apache Commons IO](https://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-io/) to native Java Platform functionality in tests (#273) @basil
* Enable [JaCoCo](https://www.eclemma.org/jacoco/) in CI runs (#283) @basil
* Run tests with [JUnit Jupiter](https://junit.org/junit5/docs/current/user-guide/) (#278) @basil
* Prefer `assertThrows` to try/fail/catch in tests (#276) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [SLF4J](https://www.slf4j.org/) from 2.0.0 to 2.0.1 (#275, #274) @dependabot
* Bump [Rhino](https://github.com/mozilla/rhino) from 1.7R2 to 1.7R5 (#268) @basil
* Remove unneeded [Animal Sniffer](https://www.mojohaus.org/animal-sniffer/) managed dependency entry (#269) @basil
* Remove redundant [Maven AntRun Plugin](https://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-antrun-plugin/) version (#272) @basil
* Remove redundant [Maven JAR Plugin](https://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-jar-plugin/) version (#266) @basil

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* Bump [Eclipse Jetty](https://www.eclipse.org/jetty/) from 10.0.11 to 10.0.12 (#261, [changelog](https://github.com/eclipse/jetty.project/releases/tag/jetty-10.0.12)) @dependabot

## 👻 Maintenance

* Re-enable SpotBugs and fix some issues (#259) @Vlatombe
* Improve comment and error message (#253) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [SLF4J](https://www.slf4j.org) from 2.0.0-alpha6 to 2.0.0 (#265) @basil
* Bump [Maven JAR Plugin](https://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-jar-plugin/) from 3.2.2 to 3.3.0 (#263) @dependabot
* Bump [Maven Shade Plugin](https://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-shade-plugin/) from 3.3.0 to 3.4.0 (#264) @dependabot
* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.85 to 1.88 (#260, #258, #254) @dependabot
* Bump [Release Drafter](https://github.com/release-drafter/release-drafter) from 5.20.0 to 5.20.1 (#255) @dependabot

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* Write port value atomically (#249) @Pldi23
* Improve validation of war files during extraction (#246) @JLLeitschuh
<!-- db: Rephrased to not give the impression this addresses a vulnerability, it does not. -->

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.78 to 1.85 (#250, #247, #245, #243, #242, #241) @dependabot
* Bump [`git-changelist-maven-extension`](https://github.com/jenkinsci/incrementals-tools) from 1.3 to 1.4 (#244) @dependabot

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* [JENKINS-68933](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-68933): Enable WebSocket (#240) @jglick

## 📝 Documentation updates

* Update `README` (#239) @basil

## 💥 Breaking changes

**Note:** Winstone 6.x is based on [Jetty](https://www.eclipse.org/jetty/) 10.0.x, Servlet 4.0, JakartaEE 8/`javax.servlet.*`, and requires Java 11+.

* Remove ability to load PEM certificates (#232) @timja
* Require Java 11 (#228, #181)

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* Upgrade Jetty to 10.0.11 (#181) @olamy

## 👻 Maintenance

* Add Java 17 on CI (#236) @timja
* Remove unused resource bundle key (#234) @timja

## 🚦 Tests

* Rework five second sleep with 100 millisecond intervals (#233) @fioxxu
* Make test less flaky (#229) @basil

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump parent POM from 1.76 to 1.78 (#238, #228) @dependabot

## What's Changed
* Bump jetty.version from 9.4.46.v20220331 to 9.4.48.v20220622 (#227) by @olamy in https://github.com/jenkinsci/winstone/pull/230


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jenkinsci/winstone/compare/winstone-5.26...winstone-5.27

* [JENKINS-68386](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-68386) - add option to set responseHeaderSize (#222) @mawinter69

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* [JENKINS-66745](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-66745) - Winstone: http/2 port not backward compatible with ALPN http/1.1 clients (#226) @coco80021

## 👻 Maintenance

* for now ignore jetty upgrade >= 10 (#221) @olamy

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump jenkins from 1.74 to 1.76 (#225) @dependabot
* Bump release-drafter/release-drafter from 5.19.0 to 5.20.0 (#224) @dependabot
* Bump jenkins from 1.73 to 1.74 (#223) @dependabot
* Bump maven-antrun-plugin from 3.0.0 to 3.1.0 (#220) @dependabot

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump jenkins from 1.72 to 1.73 (#218) @dependabot
* Bump jetty.version from 9.4.45.v20220203 to 9.4.46.v20220331 (#217) @dependabot
* Bump maven-shade-plugin from 3.2.4 to 3.3.0 (#216) @dependabot
* Bump jenkins from 1.71 to 1.72 (#214) @dependabot

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
## 🚀 New features and improvements

* Add an option to write the listening port to a file (#174) @Vlatombe

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump release-drafter/release-drafter from 5.18.1 to 5.19.0 (#212) @dependabot
* Bump jenkins from 1.70 to 1.71 (#210) @dependabot

## 📝 Documentation updates

* Add additional note on loopback address to test (#205) @timja

## 👻 Maintenance

* remove obvious non needed cast (#207) @olamy

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
## 💥 Breaking changes

* Remove automatic self signed cert if tls specified but no keystore (#203) @timja

## 👻 Maintenance

* Remove redundant group id (#204) @timja

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump [Eclipse Jetty](https://www.eclipse.org/jetty/) from 9.4.43.v20210629 to 9.4.45.v20220203 (#192, #171) @dependabot
* Bump [Release Drafter](https://github.com/release-drafter/release-drafter) from 5.15.0 to 5.18.1 (#191, #190) @dependabot
* Bump [parent POM](https://github.com/jenkinsci/pom) from 1.65 to 1.70 (#186, #177, #169) @dependabot
* Bump [Maven JAR Plugin](https://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-jar-plugin/) from 3.2.0 to 3.2.2 (#189) @dependabot
* Bump [`git-changelist-maven-extension`](https://github.com/jenkinsci/incrementals-tools) from 1.2 to 1.3 (#185) @dependabot
* Bump [`support-log-formatter`](https://github.com/jenkinsci/lib-support-log-formatter) from 1.0 to 1.1 (#178) @basil
* Bump [`test-annotations`](https://github.com/jenkinsci/lib-test-annotations) from 1.3 to 1.4 (#173) @dependabot

## :rocket: New features and improvements

* Append to log file rather than truncating it (#200)
* Write log file and access logs in UTF-8 encoding rather than default encoding (#200)

## 👻 Maintenance

* Clean up imports (#202) @basil
* Use HTTPS URL in POM (#201) @basil
* Fix high-threshold SpotBugs warnings (#200) @basil
* Add missing `@Override` annotations (#199) @basil
* Fix IDE warnings (#198) @basil
* Use UTF-8 source encoding (#196) @basil
* Replace deprecated `org.eclipse.jetty.util.B64Code` with non-deprecated `java.util.Base64` (#179) @basil
* Fix incrementals support (#175) @Vlatombe

## 🚦 Tests

* Test annotations should be in test scope (#197) @basil
* Run tests on Windows (#195) @basil
* Update `Jenkinsfile` (#193) @basil

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
## 💥 Breaking changes

* [JENKINS-66379](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-66379) - use default keystore format (#165) @jtnord

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* [JENKINS-66379](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-66379) - use default keystore format (#165) @jtnord

## 👻 Maintenance

* use of dynamic port for http redirect to https test (#167) @olamy
* Bump actions/setup-java from 2.1.0 to 2.2.0 (#164) @dependabot

  * This fix picks up an upstream fix for https://github.com/eclipse/jetty.project/issues/5417 which caused [JENKINS-63958](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-63958) in Jenkins 2.261 and was worked around by downgrading Jetty in 5.11.1 in Jenkins 2.263.

  * Root cause issue in Jetty: https://github.com/eclipse/jetty.project/issues/5417

Winstone 5.9.x release with backports for Jenkins LTS 2.235.x

## 🐛 Bug Fixes

* [JENKINS-61823](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-61823) - Fix `--httpKeepAliveTimeout` option which had no effect in 5.9 (#100) @olamy

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
## 🚀 New features and improvements

* Add `--httpsRedirectHttp` option that activates automatic HTTP request redirects to HTTPs (#98) @slide

## 🐛 Bug Fixes

* [JENKINS-61823](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-61823) - Fix `--httpKeepAliveTimeout` option which had no effect in 5.9 (#100) @olamy

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump jetty.version from 9.4.27.v20200227 to 9.4.30.v20200611 (#107, #110) @dependabot
  * [9.4.28.v20200408 changelog](https://github.com/eclipse/jetty.project/releases/tag/jetty-9.4.28.v20200408)
  * [9.4.29.v20200521 changelog](https://github.com/eclipse/jetty.project/releases/tag/jetty-9.4.29.v20200521)
  * [9.4.30.v20200611 changelog](https://github.com/eclipse/jetty.project/releases/tag/jetty-9.4.30.v20200611)
* Bump maven-shade-plugin from 3.2.2 to 3.2.4 (#102, #109) @dependabot
* Bump jenkins parent POM from 1.54 to 1.56 (#104, #106) @dependabot

## 📝 Documentation updates

* [JENKINS-62068](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-62068) - Update docs to reflect that ALPN is no longer required in classpath for JDK 8u252 and above (JDK-8239027) (#105) @jglick

## 🐛 Bug Fixes
* downgrade to Jetty  9.4.19.v20190610
* [JENKINS-60409](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-60409) - Restore configuration of the maximum form content size and form content keys number (regression in Jetty 9.4.24 and Winstone 5.5,). It impacts Jenkins 2.205 and above (#95) @olamy

Backports for the Jenkins 2.204.x baseline. It will be used as a base for the [JENKINS-60409](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-60409) and [JENKINS-60199](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-60199) which were caused by regressions in newer Jetty versions.

## 🐛 Bug Fixes

* [JENKINS-60409](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-60409) - Fix propagation of the maximum form content size and form content keys number (regression in Jetty 9.4.24 and Winstone 5.5,). It impacts Jenkins 2.205 and above (#95) @jglick

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Add a test annotations dependency to the 5.4.x branch @oleg-nenashev

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->


## 🐛 Bug Fixes

* [JENKINS-60409](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-60409) - Fix propagation of the maximum form content size and form content keys number (regression in Jetty 9.4.24 and Winstone 5.5,). It impacts Jenkins 2.205 and above (#95) @jglick
* [JENKINS-60199](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-60199) - Fix reverse improper proxy redirects to 127.0.0.1 due to X-Forwarded-Host and X-Forwarded-Port ordering issue (regression in Jetty 9.4.24 and Winstone 5.5,). It impacts Jenkins 2.205 and above (#94) @dependabot

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump jetty.version from 9.4.26.v20200117 to 9.4.27.v20200227 (#94) @dependabot
  * [Jetty Release Notes](https://github.com/eclipse/jetty.project/releases/tag/jetty-9.4.27.v20200227)
* Bump maven-shade-plugin from 3.2.1 to 3.2.2 (#92) @dependabot
* Bump jetty.version from 9.4.25.v20191220 to 9.4.26.v20200117 (#88) @dependabot

## 👻 Maintenance

* Add server connector builder to prevent code duplication (#93) @ChrisRo89

## :boom: Breaking changes

* Remove the protected `winstone.HttpConnectorFactory#createConnector()` method. There is no external usages, so it is considered as a minor breaking change which does not require a major release (#93) @ChrisRo89

Winstone release with backports for the Jenkins 2.204.x baseline. It will be used as a base for the [JENKINS-60409](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-60409) and [JENKINS-60199](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-60199) which were caused by regressions in newer Jetty versions.

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* [JENKINS-60821](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-60821) - set the _Jetty (winstone)_ name for the Jetty's thread pool (#90) @jtnord

## 🐛 Bug Fixes

* [JENKINS-57888](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-57888) - Restore `java.util.logging.config.file` property support (regression in 5.4) (#87) @lrpg

## 👻 Maintenance

* Enable releases of Incremental versions ([JEP-305](https://github.com/jenkinsci/jep/tree/master/jep/305)) (#81) @jglick
* [JENKINS-60606](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-60606) - Jenkinsfile: Use standard Maven run methods from the Pipeline lib (#85) @oleg-nenashev
* Fix of Windows ACI agents by @jglick

* [JENKINS-60857](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-60857) - Use SslContextFactory.Server to prevent the "KeyStores with multiple certificates are not supported" error (#91) @jglick

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->

* [JENKINS-57888](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-57888) - Restore `java.util.logging.config.file` property support (regression in 5.4) (#87) @lrpg

* Bump Jetty from 9.4.22.v20191022 to 9.4.25.v20191220 (#80, #83) @dependabot

* Upgrade Parent POM to 1.53 (#82) @oleg-nenashev
* Remove the obsolete TODO.txt (#84) @oleg-nenashev
